#include<iostream>
//#include<conio.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,a,b,c,d;
    cin>>t;
    while(t-- != 0)
    {
        cin>>a>>b>>c>>d;
          if(a%c == 0 && b%d == 0)
            cout<<"yes"<<"\n";
            else if(a%d == 0 && b%c == 0)
            cout<<"yes\n";
            else
            cout<<"no"<<"\n";
            }
           // getch();
            }
